t: Amazon Launches Rivet and Stone & Beam, Two New Furniture and Home Decor Brands | Architectural Digest
s: November 8, 2017 - Pieces from Amazon's new furniture and décor line, Stone & Beam.Courtesy of Amazon. The two furniture and home goods lines will join Amazon's other private-label goods, which include the Happy Belly brand in food, Goodthreads in clothing, and Presto! cleaning products.

t: What happened to Stone & Beam (and Rivet)?
s: I found Amazon's furniture a great deal - price, delivery timeframe (minus Covid), warranty, quality. I saw a rumor that their in house furniture brands are being folded. Is there a backstory?

t: 11 Picks from New Amazon Furniture Lines: Stone & Beam and Rivet | Architectural Digest
s: November 8, 2017 - If you've been holding out on ordering furniture online, you've got even less of an excuse now that Amazon has announced two new in-house decor brands: Stone & Beam, with its industrial-inspired "modern farmhouse" pieces, and Rivet for those who prefer a midcentury look.
Stone & Beam lighting, table lamps, pendant lights and chandeliers in modern farmhouse, industrial, contemporary and more styles.

t: Amazon Private-Label Furniture Review 2022: Rivet, Stone & Beam
s: January 5, 2022 - Amazon's in-house furniture brands Rivet and Stone & Beam offer cheap midcentury-modern furniture that is similar in quality to CB2 and West Elm.
